description: Bottom-left panel of the Quad layout. Russian troops begin to fall back through churned fields, abandoning cannon and wounded comrades. Smoke drifts low over the ground. Swedish flags rise above the advancing line as officers rally the men to keep formation.
narration: Retreat turns to rout — the enemy breaks before the Swedish advance.
info: Page 10 – Swedish Push Forward. PageType: 4). Scene (panel 3): Russians retreating under pressure, Swedish line maintaining cohesion amid smoke.
